title: Zachary Dickson
text:
I’m currently a postdoctoral research fellow at the London School of Economics and Political Science on the COVIDEU project. I’m also affiliated with the  LSE Data Science Institute.   My research focuses on social identity, elites and political representation, but I’m broadly interested in political communication and behavior. I’m also a bit of a methods nerd and I really enjoy trying to apply the latest computational and statistical methods in my research. You can find out more about some of my current research projects here.

Prior to my doctoral research at the University of Glasgow, I earned a masters in international relations at the University of Edinburgh and a bachelor’s degree in political science at Northeastern Illinois University in my hometown of Chicago.
A copy of my CV can be downloaded  here.
